item.title: Universal's first UK theme park given planning permission
item.description: The park is expected to attract more than eight million annual visitors and open in 2031.

item.title: Foreign interference in UK politics to be investigated after jailing of ex-Welsh Reform leader
item.description: Communities Secretary Steve Reed says the country "must learn the lessons" from a recent court case.

item.title: Teenage boy arrested on suspicion of murdering girl, 9
item.description: The girl was found dead at a house in Weston-super-Mare on Monday evening.

item.title: Thousands of dinosaur footprints found on Italian mountain
item.description: The footprints date back some 210 million years and show traces of toes and claws.

item.title: Who are the victims?
item.description: Authorities say two rabbis, a Holocaust survivor and a 10-year-old girl were among the victims.
